DOC.brief_summary: The investigators want to investigate if HIV sero-positive males benefit from vitamin D supplementation. The study runs in 16 weeks and the participants are treated with one of three placebo controlled regimes (tablets): 1. Calcium 2. Calcium and 25-hydroxy-vitamin D 3. Calcium and 25-hydroxy-vitamin D and 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D The endpoints are: - Serum vitamin D - Parathyroid hormone - ionized calcium - T-lymphocyte fractions (na√Øve, mature, Tregs) - Osteocalcin (bone metabolism)
DOC.brief_title: Study of Vitamin D Supplementation to Male HIV Sero-positive Patients
DOC.criteria: male HIVpositive at least 18 years old receiving HiglyActiveAntiRetroviral Therapy (HAART) hypercalcemia tuberculosis osteoporosis or other bone disease cancer with bone metastasis
